comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux i686; zh-TW; rv:1.9.2.10) Gecko/20100922 Ubuntu/10.10 (maverick) Firefox/3.6.10
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux i686; zh-TW; rv:1.9.2.10) Gecko/20100922 Ubuntu/10.10 (maverick) Firefox/3.6.10

When I edit my blog in NOWnews, sometimes the editing field will be gone. It is reproduced when I finish an article and save it and if I want to type anoter article, the editing field will be not there.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.Write an article.
2.Save the article.
3.Start another article.
Actual Results:  
The editing field is disappeared.(Not there)

Expected Results:  
When every time I want to start an article, the editing field can be shown there.

The NOWnews Blog had a big change this year. They changed the system this year.
comments.creator: benlu456@hotmail.com
comments.author: benlu456@hotmail.com
